headline: Is America Falling Apart? If So, Why?
snippet: Responding to a column by David Brooks, readers offer a mix of optimism, pessimism and puzzlement.
abstract: Responding to a column by David Brooks, readers offer a mix of optimism, pessimism and puzzlement.

headline: Convoys of Canadian trucks are en route to Ottawa for a protest against vaccine mandates.
snippet: Truckers from across the country aim to converge at on Saturday outside of Parliament to protest federal vaccination mandates.
abstract: Truckers from across the country aim to converge at on Saturday outside of Parliament to protest federal vaccination mandates.

headline: Political Theater on an Ohio Debate Stage
snippet: The Ohio Senate primary is months away, but candidates are already clamoring for attention. That hunger prompted a debate Thursday between a left-wing Democrat and far-right Republican even before voters decide who the eventual nominees will be.
abstract: The Ohio Senate primary is months away, but candidates are already clamoring for attention. That hunger prompted a debate Thursday between a left-wing Democrat and far-right Republican even before voters decide who the eventual nominees will be.

headline: How Independent Voters Feel About Biden
snippet: Responses to a focus group of independent voters. Also: President Biden and the economy; Boris Johnson; sanctions against Russia; debtors and lawyers.
abstract: Responses to a focus group of independent voters. Also: President Biden and the economy; Boris Johnson; sanctions against Russia; debtors and lawyers.

headline: Confessions of a Liberal Heretic
snippet: Ruy Teixeira was co-author of one of the most influential political books of the 21st century. Now, he says, Democrats are getting its lessons all wrong.
abstract: Ruy Teixeira was co-author of one of the most influential political books of the 21st century. Now, he says, Democrats are getting its lessons all wrong.
